Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: restructure URLs and improve permission system

- Move all admin pages to /shop-admin/* path
- Move superadmin pages to /shop-admin/super/*
- Implement meta-based permission system replacing hardcoded publicPages array
- Add role-based access control for superadmin pages
- Add business selection check for superadmins accessing regular admin pages
- Update all navigation menus with shop-admin- prefix
- Update all router.push\(\) calls in components and pages
- Add public page meta information \(support, privacy, terms\)
- Add support link to PublicHeader navigation
- Create comprehensive IA documentation \(router-restructure-2026-02-12.md\)
- Create updated TODO roadmap \(todo-2026-02-12.md\)

Key improvements:
- Clear URL structure separating public and admin pages
- Meta-based permission checks for better maintainability
- Enhanced security with proper access control
- Complete documentation of URL structure and permissions

BREAKING CHANGE: Admin page URLs changed from / to /shop-admin/
All admin pages now require /shop-admin/ prefix. Users with bookmarked
admin pages will need to update their bookmarks. Login redirects now
go to /shop-admin/dashboard instead of /dashboard.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
